name: Sudoku (Full): Free Daily Puzzles by Penny Dell
name_original: Sudoku (Full): Free Daily Puzzles by Penny Dell
description:
Sudoku (Full): Free Daily Puzzles by Penny Dell is a digital board game developed by PuzzleNation.
Sudoku (Full): Free Daily Puzzles by Penny Dell is available on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
